title: Wok&Go
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Asian fusion restaurant offering custom wok dishes with rice/noodles, choice of veggies like broccoli, cilantro, peanuts, and mushrooms, plus a variety of sauces. Has vegan-suitable soup and other vegetarian sides. Hidden in the back of a large house a few blocks from Jardin Zenea. Offers a "base of the week" like udon or wild rice, and frequent daily specials posted on its facebook.
